extensionAttribute.displayName: OS - Admin Privileges (Via Sudo) Only Permitted for Valid Login Sessions
extensionAttribute.description: This extension attribute will check /etc/sudoers to make sure that the defaults specification for TTY Tickets is set.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredResult="Defaults tty_tickets" result=`cat /etc/sudoers | grep "$desiredResult" | tail -1` if [ "$result" == "$desiredResult" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi
